column5: Beautiful two-story condo with stainless steel appliances, hardwood laminate throughout with ceramic tile in wet areas. Gated community, pet friendly, with 2 pools and clubhouse. Less than 5 minute drive to both the Galleria and Valley View Mall, with similar proximity to a plethora of Addison's finest restaurants (Pluckers, Twin Peaks, Hooters, Yard House, Lazy Dog, RA Sushi, and more). Ask about booking this cost friendly Dallas home. It will be the best Airbnb decision you've made.
